containerDetails.title: How to Build a Dyson Sphere - The Ultimate Megastructure

pageProps.description:
To support Kurzgesagt and learn more about Brilliant, go to https://www.brilliant.org/nutshell and sign up for free. The first 688 people that go to that link will get 20% off the annual Premium subscription.

Get your Dyson Sphere Poster here: https://standard.tv/collections/in-a-nutshell/products/in-a-nutshell-dyson-sphere-poster

If humans want to expand into space, it will take us incredible amounts of energy. How do we do that? Easy: we will just use the sunâ€™s energy by realizing the most ambitious construction project in history. This is how it works.

Sources:
https://sites.google.com/view/sourcesdysonsphere/startseite
